sentences.en: Away she went, then, glad to escape the surveillance of the odious bully, Captain Bragg.
sentences.cn: 于是她走了, 她很高兴, 因为从此可以摆脱那个又凶又讨厌的布拉格船长的监视.

sentences.en: Beowulf: The odious one whose heart pumps the blood of Sparda!
sentences.cn: 贝尔渥夫: 流着斯巴达之血令人憎恶的家伙!

sentences.en: Herr Schmidt is certainly the most odious man I have ever met.
sentences.cn: 赫尔·施密特无疑是我见过的最让人作呕的人。

sentences.en: His behavior was odious to her.
His character could best be described as odious.
sentences.cn: 他的人格用可憎来形容最贴切.

sentences.en: It was always odious to her to have any small fears or contrivances about her actions.
sentences.cn: 她的行动哪怕有一丝一毫的顾虑和虚伪,都会引起她的反感.

sentences.en: It was as if he preferred not to embarrass his guest in the odious task.
sentences.cn: 看起来他不想在他的客人做这件令人恼恨的工作时让他为难.

sentences.en: Letters of business too! How odious I should think them!
sentences.cn: 还得写事务上的信,我看这是够厌烦的 吧!

sentences.en: Mr. Smith is certainly the most odious man I have ever met.
sentences.cn: 施密斯先生无疑是我见过的最可恨的人。

sentences.en: Odious and unspeakable as all this would be if she were sane and conscious.
sentences.cn: 倘若娜塔丽这时是神志清醒的,那么这一切就会令人作呕,不可名状的.

sentences.en: The characteristic of odious debts lies in their untransferability.
sentences.cn: 恶债的特点在于它的不可转移性.

sentences.en: The judge described the crime as odious.
sentences.cn: 法官称这一罪行令人发指。

sentences.en: The meat was burned, lumpy, cold, greasy , altogether odious.
sentences.cn: 肉是烧焦的, 又硬, 又冷, 又油腻, 简直叫人恶心.

sentences.en: This place has an odious smell; something must be rotten.
sentences.cn: 这个地方有一股臭味, 一定有东西腐烂了.
真是个讨厌透顶的家伙！

trans.tran_cn: 可憎的，讨厌的，令人作呕的
